name: DogFight Game
description:
A Dogfight Game with planes you can tease the opponent fighter planes by taking the quick turns. A turn of jet plane makes the opponent fighter to take a long turn here gives the fun factor.There are few power ups in the Dog Fight game the first one is a parachute which acts as a shield that protects from the missiles aiming at the player plane a serious and fun aerial battle runs around the area.This DogFight Game is free of cost.There are 3 Different AI planes which each with a different action to surely deliver addictive game play The Android Game play video is attached along with the game.

Game Link : Dogfight Game For free Here.
